resources.string: If you have any information regarding this case, please contact Homicide at 416–808–7400 or at homicide@torontopolice.on.ca
If you have information regarding a missing child, call Missing Child Society of Canada toll-free at 800–661–6160 or email tips@mcsc.ca
You can also contact the Toronto Police Service non-emergency number: 416–808–2222, or anonymously call Crime Stoppers, toll free line: 800–222–8477
Crime Stoppers: Phone anonymously at 416–222–8477 or via the internet at www.222tips.com. You can also text TOR and your message to 274637

The Toronto Most Wanted App is a tool designed to help identifying criminals in Toronto, missing children in Ontario and helping with ongoing investigations. The app provides information issued by the Toronto Police and Missing Children Society of Canada websites in a user friendly interface.
For suggestions, report errors or if you just want to say hi, you can reach us at contact@bartuciotti.com
Please give us 5 stars ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ and a positive review to support our work.\nOur code is open source and can be accessed at:
